amendatorysection.para: Wherever any paving district is created adjacent to any state institution or the Nebraska State Fairgrounds, the chief executive officer in charge of the state institution or the chairperson of the Nebraska State Fair Board for the fairgrounds is authorized to sign petitions, in the name of the state, to create paving districts.

annotation.para: County commissioners are authorized to count the state's property as favoring the improvement when a petition is signed by the officers having charge of state institutions. Brown Real Estate Co. v. Lancaster County, 108 Neb. 514, 188 N.W. 247 (1922).
